name: Fool's Gold (ScottMackenzie)
description:
This is my project for my Game Engine 2 project at UWS. I made this in Unity over the course of about 2 weeks. All 3D, 2D and audio assets used in the project were sourced and are appropriately credited within a media catalogue. The game isn't perfect and is in beta stage at best right now with some bugs and missing features however it is perfectly playable. 

I will mention that there are a couple of bugs in particular that can be annoying with the AI sometimes walking through walls to get to you and in the exterior levels the torches have a weird visual effect around them due to fog.

However, performance wise the game should run fine on most hardware and you shouldn't encounter any crashes or constant heavy frame drops.
